welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Novate Milanese, a charming city known for its rich history and vibrant culture. Get ready to immerse yourself in the beauty of this city and discover all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and embrace the Italian way of life."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, primarily used by low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for the first 60 minutes.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bergamo - Orio al Serio Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bergamo - Orio al Serio Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
